prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a giant trash monster with vibrant colors and quirky features.
Design a Pokemon with a unique shape that embodies environmental themes and is covered in odd items.
Imagine a creature with a playful personality that thrives in urban settings and has colorful trash-like features.
Generate a Pokemon that can camouflage into its surroundings, using various colors like browns and greens.
Show me a quirky Pokemon that has a body made of waste materials, complete with fun accessories!
Make a creature that showcases recycling through its design, featuring a mix of bright and dark colors.
Give me a Pokemon that represents pollution and waste, with a distinctive and messy appearance.
